name: Hungry-Worms
description:
Eat... That’s all what you need to do… keep eating and stay away from the other worms.
Touch the screen to move your worm. Double click the screen to speed yourself to get more food or to escape from another worms.

Features:
* Easy to move... just touch the screen to move your worm.
* Double click the screen to speed yourself.
* Now you can build you own worm.
* Choose and play using your favorite background.
* Super animations.
* Share your score on Facebook.
* Multi-colored worms.
* Super Addictive Game.
* Artificial Intelligence Integration. This game will challenge you.
